thread.section_title: Devon Valley Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely location !
thread.title_full: Lovely location ! - Review of Devon Valley Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: jennifergL1607CA
title: Lovely location !
text: We had Suite 4 which was quiet, comfortable and roomy. Lovely pool behind the suite and it was all very peaceful. Breakfast was really good but disappointed with the dinner as very little choice unless you like Burgers & Pizzas (which I don't eat) so that could certainly be improved. The staff were very helpful and friendly and it is in a lovely situation.
